column2: The ammo bag can be deployed on the ground, so that you and your crew can use it.$NL;Ammo for everyone.
This upgrades the amount of ammo that can be acquired from the bag.$NL;Even more ammo for everyone.
Body armor removes some of the damage received in combat.$NL;Good when moving between cover or in close combat.
This upgrade adds more bullets to every clip.$NL;Some extra bullets can make all the difference in the world.
This upgrades the ammo clip amount for the GL40 Grenade Launcher.$NL;Why carry few ammo clips, when you can carry many?
This upgrade increases the damage of the weapon.$NL;Nice when taking down heavier enemies.

All your teammates get a damage multiplier. The benefit of a Crew Bonus only applies to the three teammates of the one who equips it. This means that someone else on the team needs to equip a crew bonus in order for you to directly benefit from it. Multipliers do not stack if several teammates equip the same crew bonus.

STATS : 7.62mm : Automatic : Medium recoil$NL;Stick it to the man with the premiere choice amongst entrepeneurs and thugs alike. Simple Design, high reliability, low cost and so popular it is a part of a national flag - the AK was built to heist.
The ammo bag is deployable equipment. Once placed it can be interacted with by any player to fully restore all ammo until depleted.

STATS : 9mm : Semiautomatic : Low recoil$NL;The B9-S is one of the most used law-enforcement pistols today.$NL;The relatively light damage is compensated by its big clips.$NL;A sidearm for the professional.
Body armor absorbs more damage before the wearer get hurt. How much more depends on the upgrade level.

STATS : .45 Caliber : Semiautomatic : Medium recoil$NL;The C45 is a very reliable weapon that has proven its worth over years of use. It does enough damage and carries enough rounds to handle most targets. A good all rounder.
The doctor bag is deployable equipment. Once placed it can be interacted with by any player to fully restore health until depleted.
Extra cable ties gives more cable ties to start with. How much more depends on the upgrade level.
Extra start out ammo allows the owner to carry more ammo. How much more depends on the upgrade level.

All your teammates melee attack range increases. The benefit of a Crew Bonus only applies to the three teammates of the one who equips it. This means that someone else on the team needs to equip a crew bonus in order for you to directly benefit from it. Multipliers do not stack if several teammates equip the same crew bonus.

STATS : 9mm : Full Auto : Low recoil$NL;The military has it, the police have it, and now you have it. The Stryk is an easy to use fully automatic pistol, specifically designed to fight crime. Wait a minute...

STATS : 7.62mm : High capacity magazine$NL;Even though it was originally designed as a mounted machinegun, the Brenner 21 is a mobile powerhouse. With its huge capacity magazine, this is a given choice for the assault specialist.
Supposed to give the owner an increased intimidation factor.
Gain cash and level up your reputation to unlock more weapons, equipment and crew bonuses.

STATS : 7.62mm : Semiautomatic : Medium recoil$NL;Chambered for the 7.62 mm round, the M308 has made its way out on the black market after years of military service.$NL;When one well placed shot is all you need, this is it.

STATS : 5.56mm : Semiautomatic : Medium recoil$NL;The AMCAR-4 is one of the most versatile assault rifles there is.$NL;The good accuracy coupled with the high rate of fire prepares its owner for any situation.
STATS : 40mm rounds : Single-shot : Break Action$NL;The Thump-Gun"
column6: and "The Ex-Wife" - things we love have many names. The GL40 is a single-shot
column7: shoulder-fired break action grenade launcher that aims to please."

column2: STATS : .45 Caliber : Very high fire rate$NL;Against its original purpose, black market upgrades have converted the MARK11 into a fully automatic monster of a weapon.$NL;When in need of a close range bullet hose, look no further.

All your teammates get to carry more ammo. The benefit of a Crew Bonus only applies to the three teammates of the one who equips it. This means that someone else on the team needs to equip a crew bonus in order for you to directly benefit from it. Multipliers do not stack if several teammates equip the same crew bonus.

All your teammates bleedout time increases. The benefit of a Crew Bonus only applies to the three teammates of the one who equips it. This means that someone else on the team needs to equip a crew bonus in order for you to directly benefit from it. Multipliers do not stack if several teammates equip the same crew bonus.
STATS : 12 Gauge : Quick action$NL;The Locomotive is a compact, extremely fast 12-gauge shotgun.$NL;Clearing an entire room in a few seconds is what this was made for.

STATS : 9mm : High rate of fire and low recoil$NL;COMPACT-5 is hands down the most frequently used weapon of special operation units.$NL;With its low recoil and compact size it is ideal for urban combat.

All your teammates get a cash multiplier. The benefit of a Crew Bonus only applies to the three teammates of the one who equips it. This means that someone else on the team needs to equip a crew bonus in order for you to directly benefit from it. Multipliers do not stack if several teammates equip the same crew bonus.

All your teammates get a health multiplier. The benefit of a Crew Bonus only applies to the three teammates of the one who equips it. This means that someone else on the team needs to equip a crew bonus in order for you to directly benefit from it. Multipliers do not stack if several teammates equip the same crew bonus.
STATS : 12 Gauge : Very high damage$NL;There is no more powerful firearm than the pump-action, 12 gauge bore Reinbeck shotgun.$NL;What it lacks in speed, it makes up for in raw, indisputable power.

STATS : .44 Caliber : Six-shooter : High recoil$NL;Primarily developed for hunting big animals, the Bronco has found its use against heavily armored targets.$NL;With its .44 round, it packs a mean punch.

Based on internet blueprints, the Sentry Gun is a criminal's best friend. Two guns connected to a computer automatically aim and fire at any target detected by its sensors. Being the bad guy has never felt more alien.

All your teammates get improved accuracy. The benefit of a Crew Bonus only applies to the three teammates of the one who equips it. This means that someone else on the team needs to equip a crew bonus in order for you to directly benefit from it. Multipliers do not stack if several teammates equip the same crew bonus.

All your teammates reload faster. The benefit of a Crew Bonus only applies to the three teammates of the one who equips it. This means that someone else on the team needs to equip a crew bonus in order for you to directly benefit from it. Multipliers do not stack if several teammates equip the same crew bonus.
Thick Skin allows the wearer to receive more damage before going into bleed out. How much more depends on the upgrade level.

Crowd control is more effective for all your teammates. The benefit of a Crew Bonus only applies to the three teammates of the one who equips it. This means that someone else on the team needs to equip a crew bonus in order for you to directly benefit from it. Multipliers do not stack if several teammates equip the same crew bonus.
The toolkit allows the owner to organize, carry and protect the tools, making them more effective. How much more depends on the upgrade level.

The trip mine consists of a beam projector affixed to a shaped explosive casing. The laser activates once the trip mine is placed, acting as a tripwire to detonate the mine. If the beam is broken or the charge fired upon, the mine will detonate.

All your teammates get a cash multiplier. The benefit of a Crew Bonus only applies to the three teammates of the one who equips it. This means that someone else on the team has to equip a Crew Bonus in order for you to directly benefit from it. Multipliers do not stack if several teammates equip the same crew bonus.
The doctor bag can be deployed on the ground, so that you and your teamates can use it.$NL;It will help you help your friends.
This upgrades the amount of health that can be acquired from the bag.$NL;It will help you help your friends even more.
This upgrade decreases the time needed to bring up weapon sights.$NL;Good when you need to quickly switch to precision aiming.
This upgrades the explosion range for the GL40 Grenade Launcher.$NL;The only thing better than an explosion - is a bigger explosion.
This upgrade increases the maximum amount of ammo.$NL;If you are trigger happy, then This could be it.
This upgrade adds extra cable ties.$NL;Need a lot of hostages to trade? This is it.
This upgrade increases the rate of fire.$NL;Eats through enemies like it eats through ammunition.
4:02 pm, projects - Chavez's crib
Let's slip into our roles in this little drug deal charade...
those junkies won't know what hit 'em before it's too late.
That panic room they got in there is gonna be full of cash...
and we're gonna take it all!
2:15 pm, downtown - First World Bank
Alright guys, listen up - good news and bad news:
We got a go from our insider...
he hid the thermite and a drill in the server room - but he bailed.
The bank manager's got the key card to get in there - let's get it on.
10:45 pm, Green Bridge - southbound
OK, stay low everybody. I'm detonating in four, three, two, cover, ignition!
Well, that oughta stop the prison transport, right? Let's get moving!
Nice firework!
Let's go, guys!
1:30 am, 22nd floor - Garnet Group Skyscraper
Alright, entry point. Synchronize on my mark... Mark.
Check!
Remember: Stay low, stay dark, avoid guards and gunfire. Here we go...

6:00 pm, the District - Abandoned building
The limo has arrived - Taxman is here.
Alright, to repeat: Taxman is IRS, making a shady deal with some big corporation.
He's selling them a server with vital data. We screw 'em over, and snatch both Taxman and the server.
With those, we'll make a $25,000,000 hack. Alex, crane ready?
Crane ready.
Ok guys, at the right moment disrupt the deal, then Alex lifts the limo out of there.
Ready now!
8:01 am, Slaughterhouse district - AMBUSH!
...and also on the 45 goin' south, there's been a major accident that's clogging the entire freeway...
...it's like a war zone out there so this morning you better take scenic route!
Looks like the diversion worked - they've changed their course. Convoy should be here in moments!
OK, ready for action. These are Murky Water mercenaries, remember; use cover and shoot in short controlled bursts.
Let's get to work.
11:00 am, uptown - Double crossed
OK, I'll take the plates - you erase the security footage.
Come on we got it, let's get out of here!
No, that wasn't the plan. Don't change things up, man!
There, Slick - now I call the shots!
There, Slick! Now I call the shots!
What the..! What are you doin' Matt!?
What the..! What are you doing, Matt!?
Hah, fooled ya guys!
Haha! Fooled ya guys!
Open the god damn door Matt!
12:00 pm, Suburbs - Bodhi's Pool Repair
Bodhi's Pool Repair.
Bonjour, it's Mitchell over on Keel Street. The pipes, you know the ones you've supposedly fixed, they're leaking again.
Sorry to hear that, sir. We'll send our guys over right away.
Yeah, you hurry!
They bought it - let's drain the place!
Suit up, load 'em, get to work!

Hold the fort and keep an eye on the saws.

Let Chavez buzz you in, and then enter the building through the back door.

Find Chavez and get his key.
Use the key to open the red door.
Get into the Panic Room (Floor 3.)
Rid the roof of all the law enforcers.
Alex needs to wait for the smoke to clear, you need to keep the police off the roof until then.
Defend Helicopter (Roof.)
Secure the roof (Roof.)
Take out all snipers on the rooftops around the building so that the helicopter can drop off the C4.
Take out the snipers (Roof.)
Go through with the drug deal. This is the front that allows us to enter the building.
Drug deal (Lobby.)
Wait for the helicopter to drop the C4 on the roof.
Hold the fort until the helicopter returns to lift the panic room.
Wait for the helicopter to return to the roof (Roof.)
Wait for the explosives (Roof.)
Attach the magnet hanging from the helicopter to the top of the panic room.

Start the drill (Drill Area.)
Mount the drill on the gate outside the vault area.
Blow a hole in the wall (Management.)
Apply C4 to the wall next to the server room and blow a hole into the neighboring building.

Destroy equipment.

Escape!.
Escape.

Collect the money.
Get down to the enginge room and get the enginge running again.
Restart the engine.
Saw down the obelisk to break the glass-cage.
Saw down the obelisk.
Stir the boat away from land into international water.
Stir the boat away from land.
Escort the prisoner to the top of the right tower. When he's at the top, strap him down in the chair and send him skyward with the balloon.

Get the scuba gear!
Get the gear!
Locate the prisoner! He's in one of the trucks. Saw the doors open.

Hold the tower, wait for the airplane and make sure George snatches up the chair!

Send up the Balloon so George can fly in and pick up the Ejection Seat.

Make it to the Bridge Pillar and take the stairs to the waiting scuba gear.

Make your way further along the bridge and locate the prison convoy.

Call the elevator and wait for it to arrive, then use it to make the escape from the roof.
Get to the vault doors and enter the codes to gain access to the vault.
Enter the codes.
Make your way to the helicopter. It can't stay in the same place for too long!
Escape!
We need to pressure Mr. Garnet into giving us the access codes to the vault. Bain is trying to locate the CFO using security footage, but try to find him sooner than that.
Change of plan, get the CFO.
Find Mr. Garnet's son Ralph and take him to our chopper on the roof.
Get Mr. Garnet's son Ralph.
Enter the vault and steal the diamonds.
Steal the diamonds.

Sneak and access the alarm boxes.

Wait for Bain.

Get the drill and the thermite.

Get inside and don't draw attention to yourselves!

Keep an eye on the drill - it jams.

SAW OPEN THE DOORS INTO THE ICU.

BLOOD SAMPLES IN COOLER.
PUT TWO VALIDATED SAMPLES INTO THE COOLER.

PLAY DOCTOR.

DRAW BLOOD FROM PATIENT.
TAKE THE ELEVATOR TO THE ROOF.
Make the escape.
ESCAPE!
Using the saw, open up the security door that holds the contaminated patient.
PICK THE RIGHT DOOR TO OPEN.
Open the hatch to get out of the elevator.
OPEN THE HATCH.
Keep the civilians from activating the alarm until Bain is finished scanning the database.
KEEP THE HOSTAGES DOWN.
Look through the files and find the correct patient file.
FIND THE CORRECT PATIENT FILE.
Figure out a way to get to the contaminated patient. Prove your Harvard degree paid off.
FIND OUT WHERE THE CONTAMINATED PATIENT IS.
Wait for the elevator to arrive while making sure to keep the power running.
WAIT FOR THE ELEVATOR.
Some consoles are still online. Plant the tablets on and let Bain hack the alarm system.

Take the gold from the safe and load it into bags.
Take the gold!
Open the grate and enter the storm drains. Escape the storm drains and say hi to the pacific!
ESCAPE!
Talk to Mitchell. See if you can get down to the basement without any necessary hustle.
See to it that the drill finishes it's job. The cops might try to turn the power off.
LET THE DRILL FINISH.
Connect the rest of the hose to the hole in the safe.
CONNECT THE HOSE TO THE SAFE.
Let Bain tell you how to enter this safe.
INVESTIGATE THE SAFE.
DEFUSE OR DIE!
IT'S A TRAP!
TALK TO THE OWNER.
Get access to the secret criminal enterprise under Mitchell's pool.
Override Mitchell's code lock.
Override Wilson's code lock.
HACK THE CODE LOCKS.
Defuse or DIE!
OF THE C4 CHARGES DEFUSED.
IT'S A TRAP!
Charge defused.
Charge defused.
Charge defused.
Charge defused.
Charge defused.
Charge defused.
Charge defused.
Apply the drill to the safe and plug the power cord into an outlet. As soon as the drill is done, drag the water hose down to the basement and connect it.
Apply the drill to the safe.
DRILL A HOLE AND CONNECT THE HOSE TO THE SAFE.
Drag the water hose.
Hose stretch completed
Hook up the drill to an outlet.
Go up to the tap and make sure the water is flowing.
GET THE WATER RUNNING.
Take the printing plates from within the safe.
TAKE THE PLATES AND GET OUT!
Attach the C4 to the safe using the hole you just drilled. Let the water and explosion force the safe open from within!
ATTACH THE C4 TO THE SAFE.
Cops might try to cut the water supply. Make sure the water is flowing!
MAKE SURE THE WATER'S FLOWING.
Get down under the pool and into the printing shelter.
GET INSIDE THE SHELTER.
Pour out the thermite to melt the floor (above the vault).

Pour out the thermite in the office above the vault - it will burn a hole through the steel floor. There are two cans of thermite hidden in the copy machine, if both are carried to the vault it will speed up the melting process.
Melt the floor (above the Vault)
Hold the fort and let the thermite burn through the floor. There are two cans of thermite hidden in the copy machine, if both are carried to the vault it will speed up the melting process.
Get through the Lobby.
Get through the Lobby and make your way to the hallway outside the server room.
Check the Limo and see if you can get the Taxman out of it.
CHECK THE LIMO.
While Alex is lifting the limo to the roof, make sure to Keep the FBI at bay.
LIMO LIFT.
Wait until the SERVER is exposed before you hit them! That server is the only way to make our transaction!
DEAL GOING DOWN.
Make the escape, a helicopter will pick you up on the neighbouring rooftop.
ESCAPE!
We need to get the Taxman to the transfer room we started out in. Use all necessary force to make him cooperate.
TAKE TAXMAN TO TRANSFER ROOM.
Get the server from the Limo and make your way to the transfer room to plug it in.
GET THE SERVER, PLUG IT IN.
Get the codes from Taxman! Screams, threats and a good old beating - anything goes - we are in a hurry!
CODES NOW!
See to it that the cops do not cut the power, if they do you have to turn it back on fast to keep the computers running.
KEEP THE POWER.

Wait for Taxman to show the server we are after. Scare him into his limo when you see it - we need both the server and the Taxman. Alex will lift him up to us from the open street. Also, keep an eye out for what you can use to better your chances.
PREPARATIONS.
Get Taxman out of the Limo! Saw open the roof and get him out!
SAW OPEN THE LIMO.
Shoot at the cables snagging the limo to make it fall!
FREE THE LIMO.
Using BAIN's brain, Taxman's insider knowledge and the team's charms - get the IRS data base hacked for a huge tax cut.
IRS HACK.
This upgrade will lower the amount of firing recoil.$NL;This makes it easier to land a series of aimed shots.
This upgrade decreases the reload times of the weapon.$NL;Good for those intense moments.

Based on internet blueprints, the Sentry Gun is a criminal's best friend. Two guns connected to a computer automatically aim and fire at any target detected by its sensors. Being the bad guy has never felt more alien.
This upgrades the amount of ammo your sentry gun has, making it last longer.$NL;Outstanding. Now all we need is a deck of cards.
This upgrades the amount of heat your sentry gun can take before going out.$NL;When you are in a tight spot, this might save your life.
This upgrade increases the precision of the weapon.$NL;Good for long range shots.
This upgrade gives extra health.$NL;Being a criminal toughens your skin.
If you often run out of ammo, it might be a good idea to bring a bag of extra ammo. $NL; $NL; When ammo is running low, place the ammo bag on the ground and use it to refill your stash.
The doctor's bag is a real life saver. $NL; $NL; If your team runs low on health, place your doctor's bag on the ground and let everyone patch themselves up!

Don't shoot civilians. For each civilian you kill, penalty time is added to your regular custody time. $NL; $NL; This means that if you are put in custody, you will have to wait longer before the police make an offer to trade you for a hostage.
Shots to the head are more effective than shots to any other body part.
Try to complete challenges - these award cash and are a good way to progress fast. $NL; $NL; All the challenges and their objectives are listed in the main menu.
If a robber is shot down he goes into bleed-out"
column3: where he can't move and can only shoot with his sidearm. $NL; $NL; A robber in bleed-out can be helped back up at no cost."

column2: If there are no civilians to take as hostages, you can always take law enforcers as hostages.

Law enforcers won't take notice of you if your mask is off - use that to your advantage. $NL; $NL; Scout the place and take positions before you put your masks on. Once you have put your mask on, it can't be taken off for the remainder of the heist.
A hit with the butt of your weapon can be a good way to finish off an opponent. $NL; $NL; This is especially useful if you are low on ammo.

Your current objective is shown in the upper left corner of the screen. $NL; $NL; A more detailed description of the objective, as well as a list of completed objectives, can be seen in the info screen.
The police will always take the opportunity to free hostages when no robber is nearby. $NL; $NL; Spread your crew out and keep an eye on all the hostages - they are your life lines!
The four types of special units are very dangerous, especially if you face them alone. $NL; $NL; Team up to take them down!

On the info screen you can choose amongst several skill-trees which lets you specialize in different areas. $NL; $NL; The trees give different perks and weapons, and you can have them all if your reputation is high enough.
Shout at civilians to keep them in check. $NL; $NL; A living civilian is always an asset, and lying down he/she is more likely to stay alive.

While in bleed-out, you can still fire your sidearm. $NL; $NL; When a partner is helping you up you can protect the both of you, but provoking law enforcers while on your own makes you an easy and helpless target.
Aiming down your sights allows you to shoot more accurately than you do when you shoot from your hip.

It is always quicker to switch to your sidearm than reloading your primary weapon. $NL; $NL; So if you run out of ammo for your SMG and you're in a tight spot, switching to your sidearm instead of reloading could save your life.

You can reload your weapon even if you haven't completely emptied your current ammo clip. $NL; $NL;This way you make sure that you have a full clip the next time you run into trouble. This is called a tactical reload"."
TIPS:
A robber who loses all his health is put in custody. When in custody, you can only be brought back through a hostage trade. $NL; $NL; The police will contact Bain to set up the trade.
Different weapons are more effective at different ranges, and are therefore suited for different situations.
You get cash by completing objectives, challenges and stealing loot. $NL; $NL; Collecting cash rewards increases your reputation, which in turn gives you access new weapons, equipment and abilities.

The cash gauge is in the lower left corner of the screen. $NL; $NL; It shows how much more cash you need to collect to reach your next level of reputation, and what weapon, equipment or ability you will be rewarded with.
This upgrade makes you interact faster.$NL; When you need to get in and out fast as hell, the Toolkit might be something for you.
Trip mines can be placed anywhere and are triggered by a laser trip line".$NL;Having issues watching your back or taking out special units? This could be it."
This upgrade increases the explosive power and blast radius of your trip mines.
This upgrade adds extra trip mines to the inventory.$NL;A couple of extra mines will increase your chances.
